member.name: P:FlexGridExplorer.Resources.AppResources.ResponsiveSizingDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to FlexGrid can be responsively sized, meaning the column widths can adjust automatically to nicely fill the entire available space no matter what browser or device is being used. This is known as star-sizing, and you can configure each column to be proportionally sized such as 2*, 3*, and so on..
